What does the @EnvAgency do? It has become dysfunctional. 60% of all river pollution is agricultural or water industry derived. The Agency‚Äôs job is to regulate and protect rivers from this. But it is dysfunctional and not fit for purpose #environmentalauditcom

@lauraepolicy @SaveLeaMarshes @EnvAgency Which @EnvAgency specific practices? It's a rather sweeping statement !  Yes - biological monitoring is preferable in many ways, but chemical sampling & analysis (of sediments/biota/effluents) has immense power to nail down pollutants and sources.

tweets.text:
A lot to digest in the evidence to the @CommonsEAC but a few key points, for me that were made:
Water companies need to be forced to provide the data that they should already be putting in the public domain. It's urgently needed by all river users but also to check compliance..
@EnvAgency  How is this acceptable ? The people of Newcastle under Lyme are suffering . @RedIndustries2 #stopthestink https://t.co/5hbM4S4Cx0

urls.description: 'Why the climate emergency threatens us all' is a blog based on the opening remarks by Sir James Bevan, CEO, Environment Agency at our 2021 Annual Conference

It‚Äôs as simple as that . Never thought I‚Äôd see the day I would be begging for fresh air üíî someone do their job properly please üôèüèΩ @StinkStopthe #sackclaredinnis @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_WestMids @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off https://t.co/zorYDSjV6B

tweets.text: @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @lcworswick @JeanneCapey @Sally01Harvey @EnvAgencySW @LoucresswellEA @ClareDinnisEA @sarahchareEA @catherine_saxon What rubbish. You don't 'amplify women's' voices (what nonsense phrasing anyway - laughable!) You silence women. Like the thousands of women & girls set to be exposed to double WHO safety limits with massive new Essex incinerator YOU APPROVED Hypocrite!

Today I‚Äôm amplifying the voices of our fantastic female @EnvAgency operational leaders. They lead our response on the ground across the country at a local level working on our flood & regulation work. 

#ActOnTheGap #TogetherForOurPlanet #ChooseToChallenge https://t.co/P4qXVvCryB

Today I want to highlight a few of the many brilliant women who I have the privilege of working with across @DefraGovUK. They are all playing an important role shaping the #climatechange and #naturerecovery agenda.  #ActOnTheGap #TogetherForOurPlanet #ChooseToChallenge https://t.co/8DiJhU3lez

Featuring closing remarks by Hon. @FP_Champagne, #GLOBECapital's Closing Plenary will set the stage for critical #NetZero discussions to come at #COP26. Join #sustainablefinance leaders @JAmbachtsheer and @EmmaHowardBoyd in conversation with @JenReynolds: https://t.co/J9t6rvOJYs https://t.co/PZxONbjyzl

Our pension fund is committing to reach net zero by 2045 and halve emissions by 2030 through the companies it invests in.

@MissyDoom @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @bbchealth Just feels like they are finding any way they can to minimise it and make us feel like we are raging on about nothing. That letter was frankly an insult. Visiting during the day because they can‚Äôt be arsed to come and find out the real truths of this situation. Useless

@EnvAgency visiting #WalleysQuarry during the day is a start but the daytime odour is only the tip of the stinky iceberg. It's exponentially worse at night and I've come to dread sunset as that's when the landfill gas fills the house @PHE_uk #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @bbchealth
